headline: 4 Value Stocks to Buy Now Amid AI-Driven Market Volatility
summary: Value stocks are back in focus as markets remain steady. HRMY, TRIP, AES and CNXC screen cheap on P/CF, offering growth and cash flow strength.

headline: FirstEnergy Q4 Earnings Top Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: FE beats Q4 EPS and revenue estimates, delivers double-digit 2025 revenue growth and provides 2026 EPS outlook with a $36B capex plan.

headline: OGE Energy (OGE) Surpasses Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: OGE Energy (OGE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +60.00% and -5.92%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Top 5 Bargain P/B Stocks Investors Should Watch Now
summary: AES joins four other low P/B stocks that screen for value, growth and liquidity, offering investors undervalued picks to watch in February.
